title: How to write a letter to the headmaster for a school - Quora

response.answer_text: A letter to your headmaster is a formal letter and should be like he below. It should begin with your from address, Flat no.A 13 PT Appartment Delhi Then the date in the following format 23 December 2018 The to address The Headmaster VSM School Delhi Next comes the subject of the letter Sub: Application for leave Sir, After the above salutation you shall write your letter's body in three para with first as introduction second the body and third conclusion like, kindly grant me a leave for next week or kindly consider at the earliest. Then closing statements as below Thanking you Yours faithfully Signature Name
It depends on what your letters is about. Start by saying hello and introducing yourself, and then explain why you're writing to them. Then you could end the introduction linking to paragraph one.
